annotations.description: The genesis of this cocktail is a mystery... I have no idea where this drink came from, or where I got the recipe! I searched and searched and to no avail. I...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Age of Aquarius

textContent:
1.5oz. (45ml) Mezcal
.75oz. (22.5ml) Lime juice
.75oz. (22.5ml) passionfruit syrup
.25oz. (7.5ml) Honey syrup
.5oz. (15ml) Campari Float
Mint Sprig Garnish

Whip shake with crushed ice. 
Top with crushed ice and float of Campari. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s1676iRmUe4
title: Age of Aquarius
